title: Emani nE
sahitya:
Emani nE nI mahima delupudunamma


anupallavi

  sAmaja gAmini (nIvE amba) sArasa lOcani
				(svara sAhitya)
rAkendu vadana vinumika nI sariga daivamu gAna padAbjamula 
sadA vinuti salipitE nata janArti haraNa nIvE nA talli


caraNam    hari hara sura muni varuDanu nE nIdu caraNa mahima pogaDuTa taramA naruDanu nE 
pAmaruDanu dEvi vara kAnci purAlaya vAsini shrI paradEvatE nIdu kumAruDanamma
